name: Tales of the Old
description:
"A tale of conflict birthed from greed, in which all suffer, and none succeed."

TotO is a short environmental experience where you take the role of a traveler, who has come across a deserted island and decided to uncover its history.

You will spend your time exploring the island and piecing together the island’s story through locations, murals, and objects.

Want to see some of the work behind the project?
